scripts.clean: npx shx rm -fr dist src tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.lint: echo Nothing to do in client-vite
scripts.vite:prepare: npx shx mkdir -p ./src && npx shx cp -f ../../examples/client/src/client.ts ./src/client.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:msg && npm run clean && npm run vite:prepare && npx vite build && npm run copy:monacoworkers
